name: Prison Jail Break Mission 2019
description:
It’s time to get in to action packed anti escaping game. Your duty is to guard the jail and keep an eye on all activities in the jail premises and in prisoner’s cells.

Head of Mad City Crime Mafia is recently been detained and is been shifted to your jail – because no one has ever escaped from this jail due to strict surveillance and hi-tech lockers having motion sensors, electric locks, electric barred window and 24x7 CCTV surveillance with assistance of trained survival squad.

Members of mafia group, is attacking the jail for a break out mission for their boss, which you will have to stop. In this Prisoner simulator game, your sole duty is to respond to outer and inner threat. Because other prisoners also get this opportunity to get a way out illegally while the jail guards are busy in making Prison escape of Crime Mafia Boss, a failure.
For gangster, it’s a survival escape mission. They will go to any limit to make this mission a success while you, being the in charge of the Jail, “Alcatraz Prison station” has to watch other gangsters too and to stop this Mafia gang leader to break out from the prison. In this break out 3d game, no mercy – is the rule.

Like other police games, it also has a team of K 9 dogs, the head sniffer dog, named Maggie is your key guard dog to stop gangster to enter the facility. Once, the gangster gets success in escape in 3d breakout game, the level will be failed due to nonperformance of your duty efficiently.

You can call the duty officer and ask for a backup, but respond time of a backup SWAT team is minimum 10 mins – you need to engage the enemies and other gangsters with the help of prison guards present on duty along with you till you get a backup support.
